nodes.text: Sacul Industries Group was a technology company comprised of multiple divisions which operated during the Galactic Civil War, and provided a variety of technology for Star Tours and other members of the Galactic Tourist Bureau. The group's slogan was "Across the land and deep into space, we keep the galaxy moving."
This organization was mentioned only in an advertisement on the video screen found exclusively in the queue of Star Tours: The Adventures Continue at Tokyo Disneyland.
The name Sacul recurs in both versions of Star Tours as the last name of Egroeg Sacul, a passenger paged over the public address system in the queue and whose name is George Lucas spelled backwards.
